A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After 9 movies (counting Rogue One) the franchise finally had me leaving the theater without the hair on my arms standing up once.  Disney finally got their hooks into this franchise and took it the wrong way.  It feels less and less like the originals.  Which would be fine except the plot is a scattered mess and really doesn't take the story anywhere.  The \"twists\" are completely unsatisfying.  JJ Abrams brought star wars back and he's gonna have to do it again with Episode 9. If you need me I'll be mourning the loss of my best friend...
